bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of water evil stagnating in the human body. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 7: 又療心腹脹滿，腹 中有宿水，連兩肋滿悶，氣急衝心坐不得。郁李仁丸方 , “Furthermore, to cure distension and a feeling of fullness in the heart and abdomen, abiding water in the abdomen, and a feeling of fullness in the two flanks as well as heart-pressure, with qi urgently moving against the heart and making it impossible to sit, [use] the recipe for pills with yu li ren ”.
